category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_cancel_msd_request_xsl_name
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path to the XSL file used to convert TC-XML files into the International Material Data System (IMDS) Cancel Request XML file.
